history.content:
+$10K Referral Bonus+

Passport Protocol is an open analytics framework enabling protocols to create new incentive models — including token distribution, liquidity incentives, governance, and gaming mechanisms. Our team (ex-Coinbase, Robinhood, Palantir, Tesla, FB, Goldman, etc.) is looking for new contributors to help lead our efforts across other ecosystems.

Positions: Chief of Staff, engineers, ecosystem lead, designers, marketing
Involvement: full-time, part-time
Start date: immediate
Comp: expect top-level + potential for token allocation
Requirements: deep interest in crypto, high agency, ability to build and lead your own team
Bonus for Engineers: Rust smart contracts, Django, Python, and Postgres

Interested in learning more? DM @nessxyz on Telegram or email ness@passportlabs.xyz

Website: https://passportprotocol.io/
Full Job Post: https://passportlabs.notion.site/Joining-Passport-Labs-3bb2cb4af9aa41de83fa87d06bb950e1
history.subject: SWE Opportunities at Crypto Startup
